comment: /**  * Perform validation. This method does not have to be overridden in the event that no validation needs to be done,  * or the validation was done during object construction time. A {@link ValidationException} that is not null is  * assumed to contain validation errors and will be thrown.  *  * @return An {@link Optional} {@link ValidationException} that contains a list of validation errors.  */
code: /**  * Perform validation. This method does not have to be overridden in the event that no validation needs to be done,  * or the validation was done during object construction time. A {@link ValidationException} that is not null is  * assumed to contain validation errors and will be thrown.  *  * @return An {@link Optional} {@link ValidationException} that contains a list of validation errors.  */ default Optional<ValidationException> validate() {     return Optional.empty(). }
